author: hudsonjameson
content:
Hey all!
I'm Hudson Jameson. I work at the Ethereum Foundation on devops, community, and protocol developer <-> community liaison work. I am an EIP editor and organize the bi-weekly Eth 1.0 core developer meetings. You can see the latest Eth 1.0 discussion in the <#745077610685661265> channel.

author: protolambda
content: <@!489256758989029405> you can say hello here, instead of the welcome channel, which is really just for displaying server rules
